- Classification: Taijutsu,

## Summary
The is a taijutsu technique, available to the Eight-Tails jinchÅ«riki. After manifesting their Version 2 form, without bones, or while in their Tailed Beast Mode, the user charges at the opponent, striking them with a Lariat.
